channel.title: Forum of Lies Hosting Feedback List
channel.description:
# IF AN INVESTIGATION FAILS FOR ANY REASON
“You were unable to investigate your target.”
# IF AN INVESTIGATOR HAS THEIR TARGET SWAPPED
“Your target was changed!" (They aren’t told who they were swapped to)
___________________
# Prince
### Vibe Check
“Your target is Blue Dragon!” “Your target is Neutral!” “Your target is Unseen!” “Your target is Cult!” ___________________ # Chronomancer
### Time Warp
"You successfully delayed a death last night!" ___________________ # Paladin
### Inspect
"Your target is Cult or Unseen!" "Your target is not suspicious!" ___________________ # Observer
### Stakeout
“Your target was not visited by anybody!” “Your target was visited by [A], …, [B] and [C]!”
### Follow
“Your target did not visit anybody!” “Your target visited [A], …, [B] and [C]!” ___________________ # Physician
### Exhume
"Your target was killed by a member of the Cult or Unseen!" "Your target was not killed by a member of the Cult or Unseen!" ___________________
# Princess
### Flirt
"Your target is a Killer class!" "Your target is a Offensive class!" "Your target is a Support class!" "Your target is a Social class!" "Your target is a Investigative class!" (appears for Special classes as well)
### Matchmake
"Your targets can win together!" "Your targets cannot win together!" ___________________
# Noble
### Gossip
"Your target was protected last night!" "Your target was investigated last night!" "Your target was roleblocked last night!"
### Bounty
Investigative: Any combination of Gossip results Neutral Evil: Same feedback as Prince's Vibe Check
_________________________
# IF YOU CONVERT ANOTHER PLAYER
“You converted x to the (Unseen / Cult). They were __!”
# IF A PLAYER FAILS TO BE CONVERTED EITHER BY PREVENTION OR IMMUNITY TO CONVERSIONS
“You failed to convert your target!”
# IF YOU ARE CONVERTED
“You were converted to the (Unseen / Cult). You are now The (New Class Name)”
# IF A PLAYER IS SUCCESSFULLY BLED
“You are bleeding! If you are not healed, you will die in two nights!”
# IF A NEUTRAL ACCOMPLISHES THEIR GOAL
“You have won!”
_________________________ # LITERALLY ANY OTHER SCENARIO FOR NIGHT RESULTS
No feedback whatsoever or “You have slept peacefully.”

item.title: Forum of Lies Hosting Feedback List
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
Neutral feedback doesn’t matter as much, since you shouldn’t fake it typically, but meehhh. It’s better to have it, since faking neutrals is still sometimes valid.

Scum invests are not on this, cause they typically shouldn’t be faked and (it was too much work) Conversion is only on here, because it came up so often? It was already there when I took it over.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum of Lies Hosting Feedback List

item.title: Forum of Lies Hosting Feedback List
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
IF AN INVESTIGATION FAILS FOR ANY REASON

“You were unable to investigate your target.”

IF AN INVESTIGATOR HAS THEIR TARGET SWAPPED

“Your target was changed!"
(They aren’t told who they were swapped to)

Prince

Vibe Check

“Your target is Blue Dragon!”
“Your target is Neutral!”
“Your target is Unseen!”
“Your target is Cult!”

Chronomancer

Time Warp

“You successfully delayed a death last night!”

Paladin

Inspect

“Your target is Cult or Unseen!”
“Your target is not suspicious!”

Observer

Stakeout

“Your target was not visited by anybody!”
“Your target was visited by [A], …, [B] and [C]!”

Follow

“Your target did not visit anybody!”
“Your target visited [A], …, [B] and [C]!”

Physician

Exhume

“Your target was killed by a member of the Cult or Unseen!”
“Your target was not killed by a member of the Cult or Unseen!”

Princess

Flirt

“Your target is a Killer class!”
“Your target is a Offensive class!”
“Your target is a Support class!”
“Your target is a Social class!”
“Your target is a Investigative class!” (appears for Special classes as well)

Matchmake

“Your targets can win together!”
“Your targets cannot win together!”

Noble

Gossip

“Your target was protected last night!”
“Your target was investigated last night!”
“Your target was roleblocked last night!”

Bounty

Investigative: Any combination of Gossip results
Neutral Evil: Same feedback as Prince’s Vibe Check

IF YOU CONVERT ANOTHER PLAYER

“You converted x to the (Unseen / Cult). They were __!”

IF A PLAYER FAILS TO BE CONVERTED EITHER BY PREVENTION OR IMMUNITY TO CONVERSIONS

“You failed to convert your target!”

IF YOU ARE CONVERTED

“You were converted to the (Unseen / Cult). You are now The (New Class Name)”

IF A PLAYER IS SUCCESSFULLY BLED

“You are bleeding! If you are not healed, you will die in two nights!”

IF A NEUTRAL ACCOMPLISHES THEIR GOAL

“You have won!”

LITERALLY ANY OTHER SCENARIO FOR NIGHT RESULTS

No feedback whatsoever or “You have slept peacefully.”
